caption.p: Map of the FRB in BC showing the 17 selected river sites (See Table 1 for the abbreviations). These sites were used to apply quality control and analysis on available observed water temperature time series and implementation of the Air2Stream model. Colours represent the Nash-Sutcliffe Efficiency (NSE) values revealing the performance of the model simulations during the calibration time period as reported in Supplementary Table S3. Map generated using ESRI ArcMap 10.5.1 ( http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/).
